title: Niko Kranjčar
summary: Niko Kranjčar (pronounced [nǐːko krâɲtʃaːr];[2] born 13 August 1984) is a Croatian former professional footballer. He primarily played as an attacking midfielder, but could also operate as a winger or second striker. As of 5 May 2021, he works as an assistant to Josip Šimunić at the Croatia national under-19 team.[3]
